question:
[Toni], who is the sister of [Lucille], is a lovely girl. [April] and her daughter [Toni] went to see a movie yesterday and then got ice cream afterwards. [Sharon] and her sister, [Toni], went to church. [Toni]'s mom, [April], was sick, and could n't make it, and [Toni] told the pastor so he would pray for a speedy recovery.
Question: How is [Sharon] related to [Lucille]?
